description:
The truth behind the famous horror story, Yotusya Kaida told by Rei Kigata, who is destined to read Horror News every now and then. Lemon, who was taken into a marriage to an ugly woman, Oiwa. He and his business higher-up had deceived Oiwa and kicked her out of her house and family.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pages in Black (The World of Folk Tale) The True Story of Yotsuya Kaidan, the story of Oiwa and Iemon
